short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect viral tweets in Google Sheets as you scroll through Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn doomscrolling into productivity!

Harvest by Data Rush helps you collect the best tweets from X (Twitter) with the click of a button.

How to use:
1. Sign in with your Google Account
2. Scroll X (Twitter)
3. Press the Harvest button at each tweet you'd like to save for later
4. Tweets will be collected in a Google sheet named Harvest by Data Rush
